Salesforce Components - CreateBillsFromPayments
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class CreateBillsFromPayments

public without sharing class CreateBillsFromPayments
implements Schedulable

Creates bills from payments that are unassigned

Changes

08/26/24 Initial version.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public void
execute(SchedulableContext context)
Executes the scheduled job.
public static void
runFlow(Date dateFrom, Date dateTo)
Runs the flow to create bills from payments within the specified period.
public static void
runFlow(List<Id> accountIds, Date dateFrom, Date dateTo)
Runs the flow to create bills for the specified accounts within the specified period.

Methods

public void execute(SchedulableContext context)

Executes the scheduled job.

Parameters:
    context – SchedulableContext: The context of the scheduled job.

public static void runFlow(
  Date dateFrom,
  Date dateTo
)

Runs the flow to create bills from payments within the specified period.

Parameters:
    dateFrom – Date: The start date of the period.
    dateTo – Date: The end date of the period.

public static void runFlow(
  List<Id> accountIds,
  Date dateFrom,
  Date dateTo
)

Runs the flow to create bills for the specified accounts within the specified period.

Parameters:
    accountIds – List<Id>: The list of account IDs to create bills for.
    dateFrom – Date: The start date of the period.
    dateTo – Date: The end date of the period.
